scenarios.name: Create imaging center
scenarios.prompt: insert into bizes id = biz_3A1okjilRZP8q78uOQjCbmKrP2T name = Advanced Imaging Center slug = imaging-center status = active timezone = America/Los_Angeles

scenarios.name: Create location
scenarios.prompt: insert into locations id = loc_3A1okmryWDyYVl1tHMwVidSAh8C biz_id = biz_3A1okjilRZP8q78uOQjCbmKrP2T name = Main Facility slug = main-facility timezone = America/Los_Angeles

scenarios.name: Create MRI Machine A
scenarios.prompt: insert into resources id = res_3A1okoyk3YdviKOh8EiPMk8FWA7 biz_id = biz_3A1okjilRZP8q78uOQjCbmKrP2T location_id = loc_3A1okmryWDyYVl1tHMwVidSAh8C type = asset name = MRI Machine A slug = mri-a timezone = America/Los_Angeles

scenarios.name: Create MRI Machine B
scenarios.prompt: insert into resources id = res_3A1okp1BcDeFgHiJkLmMnOpQrStUv biz_id = biz_3A1okjilRZP8q78uOQjCbmKrP2T location_id = loc_3A1okmryWDyYVl1tHMwVidSAh8C type = asset name = MRI Machine B slug = mri-b timezone = America/Los_Angeles

scenarios.name: Count equipment
scenarios.prompt: count resources where biz_id = biz_3A1okjilRZP8q78uOQjCbmKrP2T and type = asset
